graphql.query:
query getClients($subscriberUuid: ID!, $searchKey: String, $offset: Int, $limit: Int) {
        clients(subscriberUuid: $subscriberUuid, searchKey: $searchKey, offset: $offset, limit: $limit) {
          id
          uuid
          lastName
          middleName
          firstName
          email
          dob
          gender
          ssn
          ethnicityId
          maritalStatusId
          height
          weight
          driversLicense
          livesWith
          employment
          educationCompleted
          status
          lastActiveAt
          createdBy
          updatedBy
          createdAt
          updatedAt

          address {
            uuid
            addressLine1
            addressLine2
            city
            state
            postcode
          }

          clientsCustomFields {
            uuid
            subscriberUuid
            customFieldUuid
            name
            sectionName
            entity
            textValue
            numericValue
            dateValue
            choiceValue
            multiLineValue
          }

          subscriberClients {
            uuid
            subscriberUuid
            locationUuid
            clientId
          }

          phoneContacts {
            uuid
            phoneType
            phoneNumber
            phoneExtension
            notOkayToLeaveMessage
            primary
            ordinality
          }

          contacts {
            uuid
            lastName
            middleName
            firstName
            livesAt
            email
            contactType

            address {
              uuid
              addressLine1
              addressLine2
              city
              state
              postcode
            }

            phoneContacts {
              uuid
              phoneType
              phoneNumber
              phoneExtension
              notOkayToLeaveMessage
              primary
              ordinality
            }
          }

          clientContacts {
            uuid
            clientId
            caseId
            contactId
            relationship
            contactType
          }

          children {
            uuid
            lastName
            middleName
            firstName
            gender
            dob
            livesWith
            email

            address {
              uuid
              addressLine1
              addressLine2
              city
              state
              postcode
            }

            phoneContacts {
              uuid
              phoneType
              phoneNumber
              phoneExtension
              notOkayToLeaveMessage
              primary
              ordinality
            }
          }

          clientChildren {
            uuid
            caseId
            childId
            relationship
          }
        }
      }

mutation createClient($input: CreateClientInput!) { 
  createClient(input: $input) {
    id
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob
    email
    ssn
    ethnicityId
    maritalStatusId
    height
    weight
    driversLicense
    livesWith
    employment
    educationCompleted
    status
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address {
      id
      uuid
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    subscriberClients {
      uuid
      subscriberUuid
      locationUuid
      clientId
    }

    phoneContacts {
      id
      uuid
      phoneType
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      primary
      ordinality
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    contacts {
      id
      uuid
      lastName
      middleName
      firstName
      contactType
      createdBy
      updatedBy

      address {
        id
        uuid
        addressLine1
        addressLine2
        city
        state
        postcode
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }

      phoneContacts {
        id
        uuid
        phoneType
        phoneNumber
        phoneExtension
        notOkayToLeaveMessage
        primary
        ordinality
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }
    }

    clientContacts {
      uuid
      contactId
      relationship
    }

    children {
      id
      uuid
      lastName
      middleName
      firstName
      dob
      age
      livesWith
      email
      createdBy
      updatedBy

      address {
        id
        uuid
        addressLine1
        addressLine2
        city
        state
        postcode
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }

      phoneContacts {
        id
        uuid
        phoneType
        phoneNumber
        phoneExtension
        notOkayToLeaveMessage
        primary
        ordinality
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }
    }

    clientChildren {
      uuid
      childId
      relationship
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
mutation updateClient($input: UpdateClientInput!) { 
  updateClient(input: $input) {
    id
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob

    ssn
    ethnicityId

      createdBy
      updatedBy

      address {
        id
        uuid
        addressLine1
        addressLine2

        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }

      phoneContacts {
        id
        uuid

        primary
        ordinality
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }
    }

    clientContacts {
      uuid
      contactId
      relationship
    }

    children {
      id
      uuid
      lastName
      middleName
      firstName
      dob
      age
      livesWith

      createdBy
      updatedBy

      address {
        id
        uuid
        addressLine1

        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }

      phoneContacts {
        id
        uuid
        phoneType
        phoneNumber
        phoneExtension
        notOkayToLeaveMessage
        primary
        ordinality
        createdBy
        updatedBy
      }
    }

    clientChildren {
      uuid
      childId
      relationship
    }
  }
}

            "not_okay_to_leave_message": true,
            "primary": false,
            "current_user": "rspec update"
          },
          {
            "id": 9,
            "ordinality": 3,
            "phone_type": "other",
            "phone_number": "+12345678909",

    ]
  }
}

graphql.query:
query showClient($uuid: ID!) {
  showClient(uuid: $uuid) {
    id
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    email
    dob
    gender
    ssn
    ethnicityId
    maritalStatusId
    height
    weight
    driversLicense
    livesWith
    employment
    educationCompleted
    status
    lastActiveAt
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address {
      uuid
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
    }

    clientsCustomFields {
      uuid
      subscriberUuid
      customFieldUuid
      name
      sectionName
      entity
      textValue
      numericValue
      dateValue
      choiceValue
      multiLineValue
    }

    subscriberClients {
      uuid
      subscriberUuid
      locationUuid
      clientId
    }

    phoneContacts {
      uuid
      phoneType
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      primary
      ordinality
    }

    contacts {
      uuid
      lastName
      middleName
      firstName
      livesAt
      email
      contactType

      address {
        uuid
        addressLine1
        addressLine2
        city
        state
        postcode
      }

      phoneContacts {
        uuid
        phoneType
        phoneNumber
        phoneExtension
        notOkayToLeaveMessage
        primary
        ordinality
      }
    }

    clientContacts {
      uuid
      clientId
      caseId
      contactId
      relationship
      contactType
    }

    children {
      uuid
      lastName
      middleName
      firstName
      gender
      dob
      livesWith
      email

      address {
        uuid
        addressLine1
        addressLine2
        city
        state
        postcode
      }

      phoneContacts {
        uuid
        phoneType
        phoneNumber
        phoneExtension
        notOkayToLeaveMessage
        primary
        ordinality
      }
    }

    clientChildren {
      uuid
      caseId
      childId
      relationship
    }
  }
}
